channel.title: QOL Suggestion - Help us keep track of claims
channel.description:
Let us click a button to the left of each player's name to assign them a class label based on what we think they are or what they claimed, by creating a popup box like you get for Defile, Facelift, and Diguise.
These labels would automatically update the right page of our log book also.

item.title: QOL Suggestion - Help us keep track of claims
item.dc:creator: slappy
item.description:
Sounds so tedious! How can you do it!?

Read full topic
item.source: QOL Suggestion - Help us keep track of claims

item.title: QOL Suggestion - Help us keep track of claims
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
it’s easier for me to click twice than to click to open logbook, click again to set cursor at location i want to type, type, then click again to close logbook, and then on top of that i have to drag the logbook out of the way of the chatbox so i can still see what people saying

Read full topic
item.source: QOL Suggestion - Help us keep track of claims
